name: Sleepless Kevin
description:
Sleepless Kevin -

Sleepless Kevin is a first-person horror game where you play as Kevin, an insomniac who has a hard time sleeping...  

Disclaimer - This was made for a 3 day long Halloween Game Jam. The Theme was "Ghost People doing normal people things." Controls -

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Right

D - Backwards

E - interact

Esc - Pause menu & to show objective

- Sleepless Kevin is best played with headphones - Developers:

Richard Belovic - Code dude, sound design, big brain.

Angus Jardine - Art dude, sound design, environmental design, smooth brain.

Discord - https://discord.gg/gspwscN

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thehermitworlds/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/HermitWorlds

Made for Halloween Jam 2021

Thanks to Zapsplat for allowing us to use and edit their sound effects!  https://www.zapsplat.com/
